DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare percentage subject reach target HbA1c level ( < = 7.0 % endpoint ) experience symptomatic nocturnal hypoglycemia treatment insulin glargine NPH human insulin .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Insulin Glargine Insulin Naïve Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Oral Hypoglycemic Agent ( )
DOC.criteria: Insulin naïve subject type 2 diabetes treat oral hypoglycemic agent Body mass index 26 40 kg/m2 HbA1c 7.5 % 10.0 % Fasting plasma glucose > 7.8 mmol/L fast Cpeptide > =0.25 nmol/L
